name: Tweet Invaders DX
description:
This is a port of the original arcade Space Invaders in just over half a kilobyte. I had to simplify a few things, like only having one invader type, cutting the UFO, and rethinking the lives system a little bit, but most of the major elements are there.

Features:

  • Score system
  • Level Progression
  • Enemy Animation
  • Enemy Fire with homing shots
  • Destructible barriers
  • Increasing invader speed and fire rate as number destroyed increases
  • Damage system (your laser cannon changes colors after taking a hit, and will be destroyed after 3)

Controls:

L/R----Move laser cannon

Z/X----Fire
